description: distressed looking figure with hands outstretched in the upper right of image reaching for a figure on the left side who is lying down with closed eyes; figures drawn in thick black lines and colored with yellow, pink, and purple
inscription: BC of sheet, in pencil: Renée | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 81-4 Steine D. | LR of sheet, in pencil:  Venedig. 7 Aug. 21. | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2035
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 1920/21 | LL in pencil, below image: Qual.
title: Torment
